SNIPS (FR) is looking for Data-scientists and Mobile Engineers (internships & fellowships possible)

  #AI #ContextAwareness #NLP #PredictiveModelling #iOS #Android #IoT #Reactive
At Snips, our goal is to put an artificial intelligence in every device, and create beautiful interfaces that blend seamlessly into our daily lives.

To make this happen, we are assembling a team of passionate, creative people that strive to apply cutting edge research to real-world problems, building delightful products that also protect our privacy.

If you believe that AI can be beneficial, want to keep learning new technologies and actually make a difference with your work, then get in touch, we have something for you :-)

WHAT YOU GET

  - A great place to work and experiment with your craziest ideas
  - An opportunity to apply cutting-edge technologies to solve real world problems
  - A team that is passionate, creative and at the top of their game
  - Cool office in the center of Paris, with great amenities (cafeteria, gym, game room, ...)
  - Above-market salary
  - Stock options plan with additional grants each year
  - Fully paid health insurance with the highest coverage
  - Fully paid lunches in delicious eateries around the office
  - Fully paid public transport card
  - Any hardware you need to GTD
  - Snips shoes and gears!
Curious? Check our job page for more details http://snips.net/jobs.html - or check our blog: https://medium.com/snips-ai - or jump straight into the process http://goo.gl/forms/unuxP6os3h
